title: 命令方块怎么使用2个方块状态。。。
author: mc3124076548
txt_content:
铁活板门
ID:   Minecraft:iron_trapdoor
facing:   south
half:   bottom
open:true
谁能帮用/setblock整合在一起。。。摆脱了各位大佬

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
1.8
setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:iron_trapdoor 5

1.11
setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:iron_trapdoor facing=south,half=bottom,open=true

1.13
setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:iron_trapdoor[facing=south,half=bottom,open=true]

replies.author: mc3124076548
replies.txt_content: 方块状态2是朝南，4是激活状态

replies.author: mc3124076548
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2019-2-13 17:26
1.8
setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:iron_trapdoor 5
谢谢大佬
